title: Specify maximal length in new comment

activities.message:
I was able to successfully post this comment:
https://demo.weblate.org/translate/hello/master/cs/?checksum=6412684aaf018e8e#comments

So maybe it's something different in your case (similarly as with your other report). Are you able to reproduce this?
activities.markdown_message:
I was able to successfully post this comment:
https://demo.weblate.org/translate/hello/master/cs/?checksum=6412684aaf018e8e#comments

So maybe it's something different in your case (similarly as with your other report). Are you able to reproduce this?

activities.message: But on the other side, the limitation certainly makes sense here, I've added the limit in https://github.com/WeblateOrg/weblate/commit/7b5eca56edb99e19916879617a4f214fd7858684. It will be deployed later today.
activities.markdown_message: But on the other side, the limitation certainly makes sense here, I've added the limit in https://github.com/WeblateOrg/weblate/commit/7b5eca56edb99e19916879617a4f214fd7858684. It will be deployed later today.
